headline.main: Amazon Expands Logistics Reach With Move Into Ocean Shipping
headline.print_headline: Amazon Expands Logistics Reach With Move Into Ocean Shipping

docs.snippet: Amazon.com Inc's China arm has registered as an ocean freight forwarder, according to the U.S. Federal Maritime Commission, a move that will give it more control over shipping products from Chinese factories to U.S. shoppers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Amazon.com Inc's China arm has registered as an ocean freight forwarder, according to the U.S. Federal Maritime Commission, a move that will give it more control over shipping products from Chinese factories to U.S. shoppers.

headline.main: Private Ceremony Planned for David Bowie, Family Says
headline.print_headline: Private Ceremony Planned for David Bowie, Family Says

docs.snippet: David Bowie will be remembered in a private ceremony, his family said on Thursday, thanking fans for their support after the British rock star's death from cancer on Sunday but repeating requests for privacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Bowie will be remembered in a private ceremony, his family said on Thursday, thanking fans for their support after the British rock star's death from cancer on Sunday but repeating requests for privacy.

headline.main: Amazon Subsidiary Gains Approval to Ship Ocean Freight
headline.print_headline: Amazon Gains Approval to Ship Ocean Freight

docs.snippet: Amazon’s China subsidiary has received United States approval to ship ocean freight for other companies, in another move by the retailer to build out its logistics operations....
docs.abstract: Amazon’s China subsidiary has received United States approval to ship ocean freight for other companies, in another move by the retailer to build out its logistics operations.

headline.main: Force India Cool Hopes of Aston Martin Rebranding
headline.print_headline: Force India Cool Hopes of Aston Martin Rebranding

docs.snippet: Force India are unlikely to have Aston Martin branding this season but talks have not been abandoned entirely, the Formula One team's chief operating officer Otmar Szafnauer said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Force India are unlikely to have Aston Martin branding this season but talks have not been abandoned entirely, the Formula One team's chief operating officer Otmar Szafnauer said on Thursday.
